senses.de: A fixed time or date by which something must be done.
senses.ex: The project deadline is on 1st September.

Tips.title: Prioritization Strategy
Tips.description: In contexts where meeting the deadline is critical, prioritize tasks to avoid missing it.
Tips.example: With the deadline looming, she focused on the most important tasks first.

Tips.title: Time Management
Tips.description: Managing your time well is key to meeting deadlines without stress.
Tips.example: He broke the work into weekly goals to meet the final deadline.

Tips.title: Consequences
Tips.description: Missing a deadline can lead to penalties, extra fees, or loss of opportunities.
Tips.example: Because they missed the deadline, they paid a late submission fee.

senses.de: A line across the prison yard under which prisoners were shot.
senses.ex: Prisoners were forbidden to cross the deadline.

Tips.title: Historical Context
Tips.description: Understand 'deadline' in history refers to a boundary not to be crossed, not a time limit.
Tips.example: The soldiers warned that the deadline around the camp was deadly.

Tips.title: Grave Seriousness
Tips.description: In historical contexts, crossing a deadline had severe, often fatal, consequences.
Tips.example: The deadline in the prison yard was a matter of life and death.

Tips.title: Figurative Usage
Tips.description: Today, 'crossing the deadline' can also mean doing something forbidden or risky.
Tips.example: He was afraid to cross the deadline by breaking the company's protocol.

senses.de: The latest time by which the copy of a publication must be delivered to the printer.
senses.ex: All articles must be submitted by the deadline for publishing.

Tips.title: Industrially Specific
Tips.description: The publishing deadline is crucial in print media to keep publication schedules on track.
Tips.example: Reporters hustle to meet the tight publishing deadline each week.

Tips.title: Proactive Planning
Tips.description: Plan your work ahead of the publishing deadline to avoid last-minute stress.
Tips.example: She completed her draft two days before the deadline to have time for revisions.

You can ask for more time on adjustable deadlines at work.

quotes.Text: Writing itself is a dream. There are days of self doubt and deadlines and wondering how you're going to pay the bills until you write that bestseller. But it's still the best job I've ever had. I've also been able to help a lot of people and even inspire a few and that feels great.
quotes.Title: American Writer
quotes.Name: Graham Brown

quotes.Text: All of the muscles were gone, so that was a real tough time of rebuilding all of that. But you have a deadline, you have an obligation. You've said that you will commit to this part, and I just can't live with myself for not really giving it as much as I can.
quotes.Title: Welsh Actor
quotes.Name: Christian Bale

quotes.Text: Artistic self-indulgence is the mark of an amateur. The temptation to make scenes, to appear late, to call in sick, not to meet deadlines, not to be organized, is at heart a sign of your own insecurity and at worst the sign of an amateur.
quotes.Title: American Producer
quotes.Name: Harold Prince

quotes.Text: When you have a deadline, or when you know that your equipment is about to go up in a rocket and you won't have another chance to fix it, your mind works in a way that it otherwise never would.
quotes.Title: American Scientist
quotes.Name: John C. Mather

quotes.Text: Peace is not the product of a victory or a command. It has no finishing line, no final deadline, no fixed definition of achievement. Peace is a never-ending process, the work of many decisions.
quotes.Title: American Musician
quotes.Name: Oscar Hammerstein II

quotes.Text: The lifestyle that an artist can have, the freedom to wander in the landscape with no real pressure or deadlines, was a very attractive one.
quotes.Title: Artist
quotes.Name: John Dyer

quotes.Text: Without music to decorate it, time is just a bunch of boring production deadlines or dates by which bills must be paid.
quotes.Title: American Singer
quotes.Name: Frank Zappa

quotes.Text: Because of the nature of monthly comics and deadline, I pretty much have to work on whatever's on fire, I'm afraid.
quotes.Title: American Writer
quotes.Name: Kelly Sue DeConnick

quotes.Text: The thing that would most improve my life is 27 hours in a day. I could meet all my deadlines.
quotes.Title: American Artist
quotes.Name: Yoko Ono

quotes.Text: I've worked my whole life and never missed a deadline.
quotes.Title: American Author
quotes.Name: Dan Jenkins
